apps.localizedDescription:
AltStore is an alternative app store for non-jailbroken devices. 

This version of AltStore allows you to install Delta, an all-in-one emulator for iOS, as well as sideload other .ipa files from the Files app.

permissions.usageDescription: AltStore periodically refreshes apps in the background to prevent them from expiring.
Allows AltStore to run longer than 30 seconds when refreshing apps in background.

AltStore is an alternative app store for non-jailbroken devices.

apps.name: Delta
apps.subtitle: Classic games in your pocket.
apps.versionDescription:
NEW FEATURES
â€¢ Supports new Quick Save, Quick Load, and Fast Forward actions in controller skins*
â€¢ Supports Core Image-based filters in controller skins*
â€¢ Assign controller skins per-game
â€¢ Export game save files by long-pressing game to reveal context menu
â€¢ Browse all Delta files in Files app, including emulator configuration files
â€¢ Supports 8-character NES Game Genie cheat codes

BUG FIXES
â€¢ Fixes overwriting save files when previewing games
â€¢ Fixes incorrect cheat formatting

* Requires downloading compatible Delta skin
apps.localizedDescription:
Delta is an all-in-one emulator for iOS. Delta builds upon the strengths of its predecessor, GBA4iOS, while expanding to include support for more game systems such as NES, SNES, and N64.

FEATURES

Supported Game Systems
â€¢ Nintendo Entertainment System
â€¢ Super Nintendo Entertainment System
â€¢ Nintendo 64
â€¢ Game Boy (Color)
â€¢ Game Boy Advance
â€¢ And plenty more to come!

Controller Support
â€¢ Supports PS4, Xbox One S, and MFi game controllers.
â€¢ Supports bluetooth (and wired) keyboards, as well as the Apple Smart Keyboard.
â€¢ Completely customize button mappings on a per-system, per-controller basis.
â€¢ Map buttons to special â€œQuick Saveâ€, â€œQuick Load,â€ and â€œFast Forwardâ€ actions.

Save States
â€¢ Save and load save states for any game from the pause menu.
â€¢ Lock save states to prevent them from being accidentally overwritten.
â€¢ Automatically makes backup save states to ensure you never lose your progress.
â€¢ Support for â€œQuick Saves,â€ save states that can be quickly saved/loaded with a single button press (requires external controller).

Cheats
â€¢ Supports various types of cheat codes for each supported system:
â€¢ NES: Game Genie
â€¢ SNES: Game Genie, Pro Action Replay
â€¢ N64: GameShark
â€¢ GBC: Game Genie, GameShark
â€¢ GBA: Action Replay, Code Breaker, GameShark

Delta Sync
â€¢ Sync your games, game saves, save states, cheats, controller skins, and controller mappings between devices.
â€¢ View version histories of everything you sync and optionally restore them to earlier versions.
â€¢ Supports both Google Drive and Dropbox.

Custom Controller Skins
â€¢ Beautiful built-in controller skins for all systems.
â€¢ Import controller skins made by others, or even make your own to share with the world!

Hold Button
â€¢ Choose buttons for Delta to hold down on your behalf, freeing up your thumbs to press other buttons instead.
â€¢ Perfect for games that typically require one button be held down constantly (ex: run button in Mario games, or the A button in Mario Kart).

Fast Forward
â€¢ Speed through slower parts of games by running the game much faster than normal.
â€¢ Easily enable or disable from the pause menu, or optionally with a mapped button on an external controller.

3D/Haptic Touch
â€¢ Use 3D or Haptic Touch to â€œpeekâ€ at games, save states, and cheat codes.
â€¢ App icon shortcuts allow quick access to your most recently played games, or optionally customize the shortcuts to always include certain games.

Game Artwork
â€¢ Automatically displays appropriate box art for imported games.
â€¢ Change a gameâ€™s artwork to anything you want, or select from the built-in game artwork database.

Misc.
â€¢ Gyroscope support for WarioWare: Twisted!
â€¢ Support for delta:// URL scheme to jump directly into a specific game.

**Delta and AltStore LLC are in no way affiliated with Nintendo. The name "Nintendo" and all associated game console names are registered trademarks of Nintendo Co., Ltd.**

apps.name: Delta
apps.subtitle: Classic games in your pocket.
apps.versionDescription:
**DELTA 1.3 RELEASE CANDIDATE**

IMPROVEMENTS
â€¢ Updates DS portrait controller skin with bigger buttons
â€¢ Updates Licenses screen to include melonDS and Genesis Plus GX
â€¢ Supports custom game artwork with transparent backgrounds

BUG FIXES
â€¢ Fixes custom artwork appearing incorrectly rotated
â€¢ Fixes game artwork not updating when choosing from Files
â€¢ Fixes crash when playing DS games and another app is using the microphone
â€¢ Fixes some erroneous sync errors

Thanks to all your feedback, Delta 1.3 is finally just about ready for public release ðŸ¥³ We plan to release the update to everyone soon once we've made sure there are no major bugs left to fix, so PLEASE report any and all final bugs you find while testing this release candidate ðŸ™
apps.localizedDescription:
The next consoles for Delta are coming: this beta version of Delta brings support for playing Nintendo DS and Sega Genesis games!

Please report any issues you find to support@altstore.io. Thanks!

apps.name: Clip
apps.subtitle: Manage your clipboard history with ease.
apps.localizedDescription:
Clip is a simple clipboard manager for iOS. 

Unlike other clipboard managers, Clip can continue monitoring your clipboard while in the background. No longer do you need to remember to manually open or share to an app to save your clipboard; just copy and paste as you would normally do, and Clip will have your back.

In addition to background monitoring, Clip also has these features:

â€¢ Save text, URLs, and images copied to the clipboard.
â€¢ Copy, delete, or share any clippings saved to Clip.
â€¢ Customizable history limit.

Download Clip today, and never worry about losing your clipboard again!

permissions.usageDescription: Allows Clip to continuously monitor your clipboard in the background.

apps.name: Clip
apps.subtitle: Manage your clipboard history with ease.
apps.versionDescription:
This update adds a Custom Keyboard app extension for quick access to clippings when editing text.

To enable the keyboard, go to Settings > General > Keyboard > Keyboards > Add New Keyboard... and add "ClipBoard". Once added, make sure to then enable "Allow Full Access" for ClipBoard so it can access your clippings.
apps.localizedDescription:
Clip is a simple clipboard manager for iOS. 

Unlike other clipboard managers, Clip can continue monitoring your clipboard while in the background. No longer do you need to remember to manually open or share to an app to save your clipboard; just copy and paste as you would normally do, and Clip will have your back.

In addition to background monitoring, Clip also has these features:

â€¢ Copy, delete, or share any clippings saved to Clip.
â€¢ Customizable history limit.

Download Clip today, and never worry about losing your clipboard again!
